mapper.insert: INSERT INTO k_airline_tbl(air_idx, air_code, air_name, c_type) VALUES (k_airline_tbl_seq.nextval, #{air_code}, #{air_name}, 100)
INSERT INTO k_seat_tbl(seat_idx, flight_name, seat_grade, seat_name, seat_price) VALUES (k_seat_tbl_seq.nextval, #{flight_name}, #{seat_grade}, #{seat_name}, #{seat_price})

INSERT INTO k_schedule_tbl(date_idx, flight_name, air_idx, start_date, boarding_time, depart_time, arrive_time, ap_idx_s, ap_idx_d) VALUES (k_schedule_tbl_seq.nextval, #{flight_name}, #{air_idx}, #{start_date}, #{boarding_time}, #{depart_time}, #{arrive_time}, #{ap_idx_s}, #{ap_idx_d})
mapper.select: SELECT s.start_date, s.flight_name, t.ap_name_s, p.ap_name_d, s.arrive_time, a.air_name, q.seat_grade, q.seat_price, s.boarding_time, s.depart_time FROM k_schedule_tbl s inner join k_airport_tbl t on s.ap_idx_s = t.ap_idx inner join k_airport_tbl p on s.ap_idx_d = p.ap_idx inner join k_flight_tbl f on s.flight_name = f.flight_name inner join k_airline_tbl a on s.air_idx = a.air_idx inner join k_seat_tbl q on f.flight_name = q.flight_name WHERE s.start_date = #{start_date} and q.seat_grade = #{seat_grade} GROUP BY s.start_date, s.flight_name, t.ap_name_s, p.ap_name_d, s.depart_time, a.air_name, f.flight_people, q.seat_grade, q.seat_price, s.arrive_time, s.boarding_time ORDER BY s.flight_name
